name: CIL Charging Schedule and Instalment Policy

notes: In Discussion
We currently have no plans to introduce a Community Infrastructure Levy

The Council will consider whether CIL is necessary to deliver the proposals set out in the new Local Plan, but substantive work is not programmed within the three-year programme set out in this Local Development Scheme.
